title: Classic Spaghetti Carbonara
instructions: Boil pasta. Fry guanciale. Mix eggs and cheese. Combine off heat to create creamy sauce.

title: Vegan Lentil Burger
instructions: Mash cooked lentils. Mix with spices and flour. Form patties and fry. Serve on a bun.

title: Grandma's Chicken Noodle Soup
instructions: Simmer chicken in broth. Add vegetables and noodles. Cook until tender. Perfect for cold days.

title: Spicy Thai Green Curry
instructions: Fry curry paste. Add coconut milk and vegetables. Simmer. Serve with jasmine rice.

title: High-Protein Post-Workout Smoothie
instructions: Blend all ingredients until smooth. Drink immediately after gym.

title: Ratatouille
instructions: Slice vegetables thinly. Layer in a dish. Bake slowly until tender. A french classic.

title: Japanese Sushi Rolls (Maki)
instructions: Cook rice with vinegar. Place nori on bamboo mat. Spread rice, add fish. Roll tightly.

title: Texas Beef Brisket
instructions: Rub meat with spices. Smoke low and slow for 12 hours. Slice against the grain.

title: Fresh Caprese Salad
instructions: Slice tomatoes and cheese. Arrange on plate with basil. Drizzle with oil and balsamic.

title: Chocolate Lava Cake
instructions: Melt chocolate and butter. Whisk eggs and sugar. Bake in ramekins until center is still wiggly.

title: Guacamole Dip
instructions: Mash avocados. Mix with chopped onion, cilantro and lime juice. Serve with chips.

title: Oatmeal with Honey
instructions: Boil water. Add oats. Cook for 5 minutes. Top with honey.

title: Fish and Chips
instructions: Make beer batter. Dip fish. Deep fry fish and sliced potatoes until golden.

title: Mushroom Risotto
instructions: Sauté onions. Add rice and wine. Gradually add broth while stirring constantly.

title: Lemonade
instructions: Squeeze lemons. Dissolve sugar in water. Mix and add ice.

title: Fluffy Pancakes
instructions: Mix batter until lumps are gone. Cook on a hot griddle. Stack and serve with syrup.

title: Caesar Salad
instructions: Toss lettuce with dressing. Add croutons and cheese. Top with grilled chicken.

title: Beef Wellington
instructions: Sear beef. Coat with mustard and mushroom duxelles. Wrap in prosciutto and pastry. Bake.

title: Tofu Stir Fry
instructions: Press tofu. Stir fry vegetables with ginger. Add tofu and sauce. Serve hot.

title: Fruit Salad
instructions: Chop all fruits into cubes. Mix in a bowl. Optionally serve with yogurt or mint.

title: Vegetarian Potato Gratin with Cheese
instructions: Slice potatoes. Layer with cream and cheese. Bake.

title: Greek Salad
instructions: Chop vegetables largely. Mix with olives and slab of feta. Drizzle with oil.

title: Chicken Tikka Masala
instructions: Marinate chicken. Grill. Simmer in spiced tomato cream sauce.

title: Creamy Pumpkin Soup
instructions: Roast pumpkin. Sauté onion. Blend everything with broth and cream.

title: Pesto Genovese Pasta
instructions: Blend basil, nuts, cheese and oil. Toss with cooked pasta.

title: Margherita Pizza
instructions: Stretch dough. Spread sauce and cheese. Bake at high heat. Top with basil.

title: Vanilla Ice Cream
instructions: Churn milk, cream and sugar mixture in a frozen bowl until soft serve consistency.

title: Mango Sticky Rice
instructions: Cook sweet rice with coconut milk. Serve warm with fresh mango slices.

title: Shepherd's Pie
instructions: Cook meat with veggies. Top with mashed potatoes. Bake until golden.

title: Garlic Butter Shrimp
instructions: Sauté garlic in butter. Add shrimp and cook briefly. Finish with lemon.

title: Classic Gin and Tonic
instructions: Fill glass with ice. Pour gin and tonic. Garnish with lime.

title: Butternut Squash Soup
instructions: Roast squash. Blend with broth and cream. Serve warm.

title: Spicy Ramen
instructions: Boil broth. Cook noodles. Top with pork and soft egg.

title: Grilled Steak
instructions: Season steak. Grill to medium rare. Rest before slicing.

title: Carrot Cake
instructions: Grate carrots. Mix batter. Bake. Frost with cream cheese.
